author: djames
msg: Fix svnmerge.py integrated to correctly calculate the revision at which
the head branch was created, even if the head branch is itself a copy
of another branch. Add test cases to verify fix.
(action_integrated): Use --stop-on-copy to ensure that log doesn't look
at copy history when calculating the branch creation revision.
testBidirectionalMergesMultiBranch): Update test cases to test integrated

author: djames
msg: In all functions, consistently use raw strings in regular expressions, so as
to prevent accidental conflicts with python metacharacters.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Pass lock tokens on DELETE.
Passes lock test #11 (verify lock removal on a deleted path) and #13 (verify
removal of a directory with locks inside).
(create_delete_body): New helper to pass along lock tokens if we have it.
(svn_ra_serf__merge_lock_token_list): this; take in hash and parent string.
